page.title: 12 AMENITIES.
page.content: {Park Veiw Caravan Site. } Mrs Stanley owns the caravan site.The people have to buy the caravans off of Mrs Stanely.There are 23 caravans on the site.They each have a patch of land outside their caravan which they can do some gardening in.The caravan inside is like a small bungalow.They have electricity and gas. {G.P.O. Sorting Office.} The post office was opened in 1984.It handles 20 to 25 thousand letters and parcels each day. {Bear Street Allotments.} The allotments are at the top of Bear street,next to the cemetery.There are 11 to 12 allotments growing all kinds of fruit and vegetables.They all have a small shed to put their tools in.The people who own the allotments cannot get their water from taps.
